Edited July 9, 2023 by Anth12

Just a guess but that might not be the game's fault.

It's a pretty known bug called Mouse Drift and it's usually your mouse doing that, not a game. It can be dirt on your mouse or driver fail, it has multiple causes.

Are you sure it never happens when you're not in the game? Or on other game?

I am 100% sure it is only in the game yep.

Mouse drift was my first thought as well, so I tested it in every other condition I could think of, and no drift at all.

I'm even writing this comment with a perfectly steady mouse.

The very moment the game launches PAF the mouse goes on little adventures on its own.
